snippet: A $105 million negotiated tax- exempt bond issue for the California Health Facilities Authority on behalf of the Hospital of the Good Samaritan in Los Angeles was tentatively priced yesterday through underwriters led by Goldman, Sachs & Company.  ...
lead_paragraph: A $105 million negotiated tax- exempt bond issue for the California Health Facilities Authority on behalf of the Hospital of the Good Samaritan in Los Angeles was tentatively priced yesterday through underwriters led by Goldman, Sachs & Company. The maximum yield is about 7.08 percent for a revenue bond due in 2021, while the yield for the other long maturity, of 2007, is about 7 percent.
